EmailTemplate.name: Lead Nurturing.Value Prop 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Do you need help saving for retirement?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How will you secure your retirement with the ups and downs of life as an independent professional? When you run your business through MBO Partners, you can start contributing to retirement options immediately. Choose between a Roth 401(k) or Traditional 401(k), and even mix and match your contributions. Not only can you maximize legal contribution limits much faster than you could on your own, you can also take advantage of special tax advantages compared to a SEP IRA. We also have specially selected financial partners that can advise you on your allocations. Read about our program in full here <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits-retirement-plan-2013>. Email info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> today to learn more, or give us a call at 1-800-220-0469. ___________________________________
MBO Partners
A Better Way for Independent Consultants to Do Business
